page.title: 20BREWERIES, ST.HELIER
page.content: There are two breweries in Jersey* {Randalls}and{Ann Street Brewery}. The Ann St. Brewery was founded in 1905 and is often referred to as Jersey's own brewery. Its best known beer is called{Mary Ann}after the brewess who developed the special recipe which is used. It brews four types of lager including the famous Mary Ann Pils. 5,400 bottles of beer and 2,600 bottles of lager are produced every day, both in cans and bottles. The brewery is a large building with a tall chimney dominating that part of the St. Helier skyline. The company owns many of the pubs in Jersey and their drinks are the most popular. Its beer and lager have won many international prizes and is very highly acclaimed.
